Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan aimed to bounce back from a heartbreak at the MCG against India.
Zimbabwe drew confidence from their recent wins against Pakistan in the last two years.
Zimbabwe's pace attack, led by Blessing Muzarabani, was a key factor.
Pakistan's morale remained intact despite the loss, with players like Babar Azam and Mohammad Nawaz performing well.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch in Perth had a green tinge and provided bounce for fast bowlers.
Rizwan's performance and Raza's run-scoring ability were highlighted.
Zimbabwe's victory was their first over Pakistan in an ICC tournament.
Others: The match was part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022-23.
Zimbabwe's win was significant in their journey in the tournament.
